title: Green Hydrogen Production Feasibility Study
description: An industrial customer wants to explore the feasibility of producing green hydrogen on-site using a dedicated solar farm and electrolyzer.

tasks.description: Estimate the cost and output of a solar farm required to power a 10 MW electrolyzer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides CAPEX and annual MWh generation for the solar farm.

tasks.description: Calculate the Levelized Cost of Hydrogen (LCOH) based on the cost of solar power, electrolyzer CAPEX, and operational costs.
Compare the calculated LCOH to the cost of purchasing hydrogen from the market (grey or blue hydrogen).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines if on-site green hydrogen production is economically competitive.
